name: Perfectly Hacked Progress Bar
description:
Sharing a cute hack to make a progress bar component where the width of the progress indicator can be easily adjusted to the exact px.


No variants, no detaching, it's pretty neat!


Update: Apparently I'm just late to the game and the hack has been done before.

(See it with sliders too! https://www.figma.com/community/file/983331560540187503/Mastering-design-systems-components

and stacked bar charts! https://www.figma.com/community/file/832936778494194740)
